title: Star Guardian Jinx annoying autoattack sound
body:
Hello, i had to face a Jinx with her Star Guardian skin. I have to ask you if it's possible to make the option to remove her sound or at least let me pick to hear her default sounds.... i can't stand to hear that "pew pew pew" anymore, it's freaky annoying and bisturbing for my gameplay. Please think before creating such a obnoxious sounds for future skins.
Thanks.

replies.body:
_thank you_

I seriously thought I was the only one who hated it
I'd like the option to turn it off for myself, I love that skin but the AA animation sound makes it one I play rarely because I can't hear myself CS...
I like the sound. Doesnt bother me at all
i love the star guardian auto attack sounds. to each his own i guess....
Yeah, i just want to have the choise, to listen to it or not ^^
Big deal. Instead of complaining about a skin's sound effect already implemented and purchased by many people, just do yourself a favor and mute SFX.
I will test that, but too bad if this mutes also my character's autoattack sound, then i can't last hit :/
You can turn down the volume if you like, thats what I do.
its her new laugh, since she cant have her laugh on repeat anymore. there had to be something god awfully annoying about the skin.

Tune it out?

It's a very important skill all humans should have mastered by the time they are adults.
Jokes apart, this is a serious issue that might interupt the gameplay for some players, giving advantage to others.

> [{quoted}](name=Làughíng Man,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=0B2AhmuG,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-10-30T05:31:58.410+0000)
>
> Jokes apart, this is a serious issue that might interupt the gameplay for some players, giving advantage to others.

I agree, Lee Sin's auto attack sound annoys me as well, so does Miss fortune's laugh when shes using her ultimate and every time Gangplank says "Barrel". Can we disable the sound period so we can just play in silence and think about our lives while we farm?
Yep, but two of your examples are skills with a cd time, and the Lee Sin's autoattack is not that noisly brain penetrating. Nice try with the passive agressive try to be a troll, reported for spam.
Yeah just refrain from making such weaboo skins in general.
